  title: Useful functions for Vectors
  output:
    html_document
---

### sum of a vector
```{r}
my_grades <- c(100,80,85,70,90)
sum(my_grades)
```

### length of a vector
```{r}
length(my_grades)
```

### average of a vector
```{r}
mean(my_grades)
```

### standard deviation of a vector
```{r}
sd(my_grades)
```

### smallest and biggest element
```{r}
min(my_grades)
max(my_grades)
```

### A lot of information
```{r}
summary(my_grades)
```
